
                            
                            <p>阳光惠生活反扫，30-3.8，还有95%名额 <br>  <br> 没工具的自己去申请星驿付的码就行 <br>  <br> 实测超的也可以用银联扫码 <br> 缺点就是需要一张收银台合影 <br>  <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/27/101220ad3p7981pzk9u7di.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/27/101220ad3p7981pzk9u7di.jpg"> <br>  <br>  <br> </p>
